dct_description_sm: Map of mainland south Asia highlighting India and lands adjacent to the Bay of Bengal. Relief shown pictorially. Inset: Ptolemaicæ Tabulæ (in parte maritimâ brevis imago). In upper right-hand corner: X. From: Atlas antiquus Danvillianus : conspectus tabularum geographicarum / Jean Baptiste Bourguignon d'Anville. Norimbergae : Weigel-Schneider, 1784.
rights_statement_s:
No Known Copyright

Princeton University Library reasonably believes that the Item is not restricted by copyright or related rights, but a conclusive determination could not be made.
You are free to use this Item in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use.
